entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Thunder Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:53 a.m. EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -0.1Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thunder Bay Airport 12:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: N 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Freezing rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Freezing rain. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Ice pellets or snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to snow at times heavy near midnight. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
